Naming/PredicateMethod.description:
Description

Checks that predicate methods end with `?` and non-predicate methods do not.
Naming/PredicateMethod.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

Mode: conservative (type: str)
AllowedMethods: ['call'] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
AllowBangMethods: False (type: bool)
WaywardPredicates: ['infinite?', 'nonzero?'] (type: list)
